title: Twin Yordle champion design
body:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/314774249070133250/328761894510788608/image.jpg
I have an idea about a possible champion design, a Yordle champion comprised of two yordles standing on each other's shoulders,
The champion can be built either full ad assassin or full tank. 
It's ult would swap it's attack and defence stats for a short amount of time, this would allow someone that builds the champ full ad to be able to strike a squishy down and then ult to try to get away and then in reverse a tanky build be able to initiate a fight and then ult when a squishy misspositions to deal solid damage before reverting back to tankiness

replies.body:
A long time ago I had a concept for a Yordle trio champion. They were a tank, mage and Fighter. They used a stance based mechanic. I'll see if I can find it.

But back to you. Good art work. Im getting a little bit of Draven/Kled attitude on the top one and a kind of Darius seriousness to the tank.

Dude a trio would be sick, switching between forms like udyr would make for some sick character design I just think it would be a bit much balance wise

Yea. I had it something like after you switch your auto attack gained an effect. You could also re-activate the ability again for a small ability.

They were all about switching on the fly. Their passive was when standing still long enough they would stand on each-others shoulders and gain bonus view range.
That passive is a really cool idea id love to see them implement something like that in game
I forgot to add the top Yordle would be focused on ad and the bottom Yordle would be tank
